servinfo.title: DTC U1144 (No. 1144): Lost Communication with Keyless Start Control Module

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC U0155 (No. 0155): Lost Communication with Instrument Panel Cluster (IPC) Control Module .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: BCM can not receive CAN data from keyless start control module for longer than specified time continuously.

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC by using scan tool.
Start engine and run it for 1 min. or more.

testgroup.title: DTC check of BCM
testgroup.question: Is DTC U1144 (No. 1144) and DTC U1073 (No. 1073) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to DTC U1073 (No. 1073): Control Module Communication Bus Off .

testgroup.title: DTC check of keyless start control module

test1.ptxt: Check keyless start control module for DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC No. 33 detected?

action.ptxt: Go to DTC No. 33: Control Module Communication Bus Off .

test1.ptxt: Check connection of connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connectors of BCM and keyless start control module.
Check CAN communication circuit between BCM and keyless start control module for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Check CAN communication circuit between control modules other than Step 4 for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: Key indicator light operation check

test1.ptxt: Connect connectors of disconnected control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Push ignition knob switch of steering lock unit.

testgroup.question: Does key indicator light turn ON?

action.ptxt: Check keyless start control module power and ground circuit. If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good keyless start control module and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector of any one of control module other than BCM.

action.ptxt: Disconnect connectors of control modules other than the one whose connector is disconnected in Step 1) one by one and check that DTC U1144 is detected by BCM each time connector is disconnected. When DTC U1144 is not detected by BCM while checking in this way, go to description under “NO” below. If DTC U1144 is detected by BCM even when connectors of all control modules that use CAN communication with BCM are disconnected, substitute a known-good BCM and recheck.
Check power and ground circuit of control module disconnected in Step 1). If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good control module disconnected in Step 1) and recheck.
